text: Apanara purbe ami yatajanake rasula kare pathiyechi, tara saba'i purusa'i chila janapadabasidera madhya theke. Ami tamdera kache ohi prerana karatama. Tara ki desa-bidesa bhramana kare na, yate dekhe nita kirupa parinati hayeche tadera yara purbe chila? Sanyamakaridera jan'ye parakalera abasa'i uttama. Tara ki ekhana'o bojhe na
